facts.text: I'm a coral reef superhero! I eat algae that could smother the coral, helping keep the reef healthy.
I have a sharp spine near my tail that pops out like a tiny sword when I'm scared! It's called a scalpel.
My bright blue color comes from special cells in my skin. I can even change how bright I look!
I love to hang out in groups! We swim together in schools for safety and to find the best algae snacks.
At night, I find a cozy spot in the coral and tuck myself in to sleep. I need my beauty rest!

profile.habitat: Coral reefs in the Indo-Pacific Ocean
